title: The chronicle historie of Perkin VVarbeck A strange truth. Acted (some-times) by the Queenes Maiesties Servants at the Phænix in Drurie lane.
author: Ford, John, 1586-ca. 1640.
publisher: Printed by T[homas] P[urfoot] for Hugh Beeston, and are to be sold at his shop, neere the Castle in Cornehill,
notes: Leaf [L]1 is in two settings: (1) with 2 rows of ornaments above the epilogue; (2) with 3 rows.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
